name: HealthGoalsAtEndOfLifeGrouping
title: Health Goals at End of Life Grouping
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set includes concepts representing an individual's goals at end of life which can be expressed by the individual in his or her advance care plan.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this value set is to identify personal goals that may be relevant and could be considered by clinicians when making a treatment/care plan for the person.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include member value sets for Health Goals at end of life for LOINC and SNOMED CT.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
